nl.BobbinWork.grids.PolarGridModel
Class DoubleChainedObject

java.lang.Object
  nl.BobbinWork.grids.PolarGridModel.DoubleChainedObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConcentricCircle
public abstract class DoubleChainedObject
extends java.lang.Object

Element for an open chain linked in both directions.

Author:
J. Pol

Constructor Detail

DoubleChainedObject

public DoubleChainedObject(boolean before,
                           DoubleChainedObject x)
Adds a new instance of DoubleChainedObject to an existing chain.

Creating new elements and linking them to one or two neighbours is combined in the constructor of the element. When linking would be implemented in a separate method, an already linked object could be linked again without unlinking, thus a mess would be created. As a side effect the chain can't be closed. Not thread safe.

DoubleChainedObject

public DoubleChainedObject()
Starts a new chain with a new instance of DoubleChainedObject.

getLast

public final DoubleChainedObject getLast()
Gets the last element of the chain.

delete

protected void delete()
Disconnects the element from its neighbours and connects the neighbours to one another. The element itself remains to be destroied, or can be re-used as a new chain. Not thread safe.
